channel.title: dev on beanmachine tech.
channel.description: Recent content in dev on beanmachine tech.

item.title: porting D to GBA
item.description: intro D is an excellent language and we wanted it ported to GBA. why port D? initially, when we began developing for the GBA, we used devkitarm as a build toolchain, and the makefiles I created for dusk, which in turn were based on tonc makefiles.

item.title: explaining GBA Real-Time Clock (RTC)
item.description: intro there’s not much documentation online about how the GBA RTC works, so this blog post will attempt to demystify that.
